医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
使用内置生长因子种植肉类可降低成本细胞农业——利用生物反应器中生长的细胞生产肉类，而不是从农场动物身上收获——正在技术上取得飞跃，使其成为食品工业更可行的选择。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240127/Growing-meat-with-built-in-growth-factors-cuts-costs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240127/Growing-meat-with-built-in-growth-factors-cuts-costs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=32fc13da-a2b9-4877-940a-a50abf5f7a4d Sat, 27 Jan 2024 08:07:44 -0500 Growing meat with built-in growth factors cuts costs
欧洲通过人工智能驱动的“PAIR”项目为未来的流行病做好准备欧盟资助的新五年项目PAIR刚刚在哥本哈根启动，来自7个国家的20个合作伙伴参与其中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240127/Europe-gears-up-for-future-pandemics-with-AI-powered-PAIR-project.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240127/Europe-gears-up-for-future-pandemics-with-AI-powered-PAIR-project.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7ab75e4f-1de4-4342-97d2-2f4608a77d85 Sat, 27 Jan 2024 07:44:39 -0500 Europe gears up for future pandemics with AI-powered "PAIR" project
神经网络在手术中提供乳房对称性的精确分析美国整形学会官方医学杂志《整形与重建外科》二月号上的一项研究表明，新开发的神经网络在识别乳房手术中重要的关键标志方面高度准确，开启了客观评估乳房对称性的潜力外科医生。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240127/Neural-network-provides-precise-analysis-of-breast-symmetry-in-surgery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240127/Neural-network-provides-precise-analysis-of-breast-symmetry-in-surgery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2f408dc3-df8e-4529-901a-12889140da00 Sat, 27 Jan 2024 07:38:13 -0500 Neural network provides precise analysis of breast symmetry in surgery

低剂量辐射有望治疗脑损伤和中风创伤性脑损伤 (TBI) 和缺血性中风是主要的公共卫生问题，也是全世界死亡和残疾的主要原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240127/Low-dose-radiation-shows-promise-as-treatment-for-brain-injury-and-中风.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240127/Low-dose-radiation-shows-promise-as-treatment-for-brain-injury-and-中风.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bf578bd8-8b22-47f4-bcdb-a3e8c203382a Sat, 27 Jan 2024 07:26:09 -0500 Low-dose radiation shows promise as treatment for brain injury and stroke

研究揭示了与其他健康问题相比，人们对 COVID-19 的严重程度一项针对七个国家的大型研究揭示了与其他主要公共卫生问题相比，人们对 COVID-19 大流行的严重程度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240127/Study-sheds-light-on-how-serious-people-find-COVID-19-compared-to-other-health-problems.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240127/Study-sheds-light-on-how-serious-people-find-COVID-19-compared-to-other-health-problems.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=08101504-7421-40fc-9a88-678bc9cb46b9 Sat, 27 Jan 2024 06:07:51 -0500 Study sheds light on how serious people find COVID-19 compared to other health problems
